Thresh.name: Threshº
Thresh.title: ºøthe Chain Wardenº
Thresh.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThresh is a twisted reaper whose hungry chains ensnare the souls of the living. A moment's hesitation at the sight of his ghostly visage and there is no escape. He leaves in his wake hollow corpses, their souls ripped loose and trapped in the sickly green light of his lantern. The Chain Warden takes sadistic joy in tormenting his victims, both before and after their deaths. His grim task is never complete, and he stalks the land for ever more resolute spirits to unravel.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThresh carves careful, deliberate paths through Valoran. He handpicks his targets individually, devoting his full attention to each soul in turn. He isolates and toys with them, gradually eroding their sanity with his twisted, maddening humor. Once Thresh takes an interest in a soul, he does not relent until he possesses it. He then drags those he captures back to the Shadow Isles for an unimaginably dreadful fate. This is his only purpose.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøLittle is known about the Chain Warden's past, and many of the details live only in nursery rhymes and campfire tales. They tell of a sadistic jailer from centuries past who took great delight in torturing his wards. Patient and brutal, he used a variety of methods to break his victims' minds before their bodies succumbed to his grisly designs. Chains were the jailer's preferred instruments of terror. Their shrill scrape marked his dreadful approach and promised agony to those he visited. His dark reign went unchallenged until his prisoners escaped during a massive riot. They overwhelmed him, and without ceremony or remorse, hanged him from his own chains. Thus began the unlife of the horrible specter known as Thresh, or so the tales go.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThresh now haunts the land, leaving an aftermath of horror and despair. However, there is a devious purpose behind his dark machinations, and the meager spirits of average men are insufficient. He seeks stronger souls. Only when he has broken the wills of Valoran's most resilient warriors will he finally have what he needs.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºø''There are few things as invigorating as taking a mind apart, piece by piece.''øºøºøºøº
º-- Threshº
Thresh.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThresh is a twisted reaper whose hungry chains ensnare the souls of the living. A moment's hesitation at the sight of his ghostly visage and there is no escape. He leaves in his wake hollow corpses, ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøCommunication is key when making use of Thresh's lantern.  Let your teammates know how you like to use it.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøDeath Sentence and Flay can be combined in either cast order for powerful combinations.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThresh can collect souls without needing to kill units himself.  Planning your map position to be near the most deaths will help to maximize soul collection.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøThresh's Death Sentence has a long cast time.  Watch for the cast to begin to take evasive actions.øºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºIntentionally breaking a wall of The Box can allow a vulnerable ally to escape unscathed.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøStanding on top of Thresh's lantern will deny his allies the ability to use it.øºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøDeath Sentenceº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him.  Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøGrab an enemy, then pull them to you or leap to them.ºøºøº
ºøºThrows out his scythe, dealing ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºø magic damage to the first unit hit and pulling them toward him for 1.5 seconds. øºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøReactivate this ability to pull Thresh to the bound enemy.øºøºøº

spells.name: ºDark Passageº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøThresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage.  Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøCreate a shielding lantern that an ally can use to dash to you.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøThrow the Lantern to a point. If an ally near the Lantern clicks it, they pick it up and Thresh pulls both back to him.øºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºAdditionally, allies who come near it gain a shield lasting 4 seconds that absorbs up to ºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºø damage. Allies can only receive the shield once per cast. øºøºøº

spells.name: Flayº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºSweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.ºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºPassive: ºDeal º{{ f1 }}-{{ f2 }}ºøºøºø magic damage on each hit that builds up when not attacking.øºøºøº
ºøºøºøThis value is equal to total souls collected plus up to ºøºøº{{ e3 }}%ºøºøºøº of Attack Damage, based on the amount of time since his last attack.ºøºøºøº

ºActive: ººøºøºøKnock nearby enemies in the direction of your choice.ºøºøº
Deals º{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºøºøºø magic damage in a line beginning behind him. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by ºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºø% for 1.5 seconds.øº

ºøºøCast forward to push; cast backward to pull.ºøºøº

spells.name: The Boxº
spells.description: ºøºøºøA prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.ºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøTrap enemies inside walls that slow and deal damage if broken.øºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøCreates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy Champions who walk through a wall suffer øºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøº magic damage and are slowed by ºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºø% for 2 seconds, but break that wall. øºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºOnce one wall is broken, remaining walls deal half damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

passive.name: ºDamnationº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºThresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him armor and ability power.ºøºøºøºøºøº
